task.title: Directory
task.shortdesc: The Square Customer Directory keeps track of customers by building customer profiles.

step.cmd: Log in to your Square account or create one at to be redirected the Square Online Dashboard.
Click the hambuger menu icon next to "Home" to open the Square sidebar menu.
Within the menu, click the customers icon labled "Customers" in the upper half part of the menu to be directed to the customers page.
On the customer's page, go to the left side of the screen to access the Customer Menu.
Click "Directory" to go directly to the Customer Directory.
Then, click the "Continue" button on the Customer Directory welcome popup.
Then, click the "See Your Directory" button to access the Square Directory.

substep.cmd: Input the customer's first and last name, phone number, email adress, adress, groups, company, reference ID and birthday.
The click the "Save" button to save the customer in the customer directory.
